Description.div: Return data that exists in the same schema as the the given ColonyId. Note this is not a filter. If multiple colonies share the same schema, the output may contain data from all of them.

Attribute.Name: MaximumRecords
Attribute.Description: Specifies maximum number of records that can be returned.

Attribute.Name: PersonInfoKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_PERSON_INFO that stores contact information of a person or a business. If this attribute is passed, all other input attributes will be ignored.

Description.div: Return data for the given table type. Note this is not a filter. If the resulting schema contains multiple table types, the output may contain data from all of them.
